about_the_game:
Simple but good! This cookbook offers numerous recipes from the game to recreate in real life!

After a brief introduction to medieval cuisine, various soups, stews or desserts are waiting to be cooked! Beautiful pictures of the finished dishes decorate the lovingly designed cookbook.

Access
The Official Cookbook can be found in the game’s install directory within the folder "Official Cookbook Content" (Steam\SteamApps\common\Medieval Dynasty) after the “Official Cookbook” DLC has finished downloading.
